control.name: icbShowCheckBoxSelectorInGroupRow
control.windowcaption: Show Check Boxes in Group Rows
control.description: Specifies whether Check Boxes are displayed in group rows.

control.name: icbShowCheckBoxSelectorInHeader
control.windowcaption: Show Check Box in Column Header
control.description: Specifies whether a Check Box is displayed in the "Selection" column header.

control.name: icbShowCheckBoxSelectorInPrintExport
control.windowcaption: Show Check Boxes in Print and Export Output
control.description: Specifies whether Check Boxes are displayed in a print and export output.

control.name: cePrintSelectedRowsOnly
control.description: Specifies whether only the selected rows are printed and exported.
